# fontWeight()

**Instance Method**

The font weight for the specified symbol weight.

## Declaration

```swift
func fontWeight() -> UIFont.Weight
```

## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont/Weight] value that matches the specified symbol weight.
